import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { IUsers } from '../crear-usuario/usuarios.class'; import { UsuariosService } from '../servicios/usuarios.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { ngOnInit(): void { this.getData(); } usuariosService!: UsuariosService; usuarios!: any; public async getData(){ (await this.usuariosService.getUsers()).subscribe((resp: any) => { console.log(resp); this.usuarios = resp; }); } }
